dataset_id: GPM Ground Validation GOES 14 Visible and Infrared Images IPHEx V1
organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: GPM Ground Validation GOES 14 Visible and Infrared Images IPHEx V1
summary: The GPM Ground Validation GOES 14 Visible and Infrared Images IPHEx dataset contains visible and infrared images from the GOES 14 Imager collected during the Integrated Precipitation and Hydrology Experiment (IPHEx) field campaign in the southeast region of the United States. The GPM Ground Validation GOES 14 IPHEx dataset files are available in PNG format at 1 minute intervals, for all dates between May 8, 2014 and May 24, 2014.
